snippet.title: Surface 2: Noise She Couldn't Make [01] w/YourGibs - Chapter 1: Fever 1/2 - Start
snippet.description:
Surface: Noise She Couldn't Make let's play walkthrough gameplay
// Part 1,  (OPENING)
► Subscribe to see more videos: http://bit.ly/SubYourGibs

Series Playlist: http://bit.ly/Surface2Gibs
Developer: Elephant Games
Let's Play ♦ Surface 2: Noise She Couldn't Make Collector's Edition with YourGibs Walkthrough commentary

DOWNLOAD: http://bit.ly/Pt5nBO

STORY: On a lonely stretch of highway, a young girl is found unconscious, a bloody knife lying next to her. Was she a victim, or did she attack someone? Her doctors are baffled when she fails to respond to treatment. Desperate, they call you in to help. As a psychic, you're used to working with clients who can talk to you. But this girl can't. Enter her mind and work to discover...the noise she couldn't make...

** Previously Played Casual**
(1) Surface: Mystery of Another World http://bit.ly/Surface1Gibs
(2) Grim Tales 3: The Legacy http://bit.ly/GrimTales3Gibs
(3) Final Cut: Death on the Silver Screen http://bit.ly/FinalCutGibs

♦ Follow on Twitter -- http://twitter.com/YourGibs
♦ Live Streaming on Hitbox -- http://hitbox.tv/YourGibs
♦ Save 20% at GreenManGaming use code "YOURGI-BS20OF-FGAMES" -- http://bit.ly/GreenManGibs
